title: Got a Pixel 3a from T-Mobile. Where will my updates and patches come from?
content:
Traded my original Pixel for a Pixel 3a, taking advantage of T-Mobile's 2-year long kickback of $400. The phone's locked to T-Mobile. I'm guessing that all updates and patches will pass through T-Mobile before I get them. Correct? Anybody have experience with T-Mobile's turnaround time for updates and care to comment?
 
I've noticed that the phone's still at the March security update.
